level.heading: Immediate discharge from facility upon request by individual.
level.text: Any individual 14 years of age or older who is admitted to a facility shall have the right to immediate discharge from the facility upon written request to the Director of the facility.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-137, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-1301.02.
